high_descs: turn right towards the bed lamp
anns.task_desc: turn on the bed lamp while holding the plate

high_descs: Turn left, go toward the sofa, then turn left and go to the desk.
Pick up the bowl on the desk, to the right of the CD.
Turn right, step forward, turn right, go forward, then turn left to approach the night stand next to the bed.
Turn on the lamp on the night stand.
anns.task_desc: Examine a bowl in lamp light.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the desk with the chair.
Grab the bowl off of the desk.
Turn left and walk to the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp while holding the bowl.
